includedAssets.title: Harry Potter And The Philosopher's Stone
includedAssets.synopsis: The most magical movie saga of all begins with our introduction to a bright but unassuming lad called Harry who learns on his 11th birthday that he is not only the orphaned son of two powerful wizards but possesses unique magical powers of his own. Invited to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry (Daniel Radcliffe) befriends the hapless Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) and cleverclogs Hermione Granger (Emma Watson). Surrounded by colourful characters and eye-opening wonders, the trio embark on a magical adventure that will lead Harry towards his unavoidable destiny with his arch-nemesis Lord Voldermort. It all starts here.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: On his 11th birthday, young Harry Potter discovers that he is the son of two powerful wizards and possesses magical powers of his own.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The most magical movie saga of all begins with our introduction to a bright but unassuming lad called Harry who learns on his 11th birthday that he is not only the orphaned son of two powerful wizards but possesses unique magical powers of his own. Invited to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry (Daniel Radcliffe) befriends the hapless Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) and cleverclogs Hermione Granger (Emma Watson). Surrounded by colourful characters and eye-opening wonders, the trio embark on a magical adventure that will lead Harry towards his unavoidable destiny with his arch-nemesis Lord Voldermort. It all starts here.

includedAssets.title: Harry Potter And The Chamber Of Secrets
includedAssets.synopsis: The tumultuous second term at Hogwarts sees the dynamic trio of Harry (Radcliffe), Hermione (Watson) and Ron (Grint) embroiled in more sticky and shady situations than you can shake a wand at. Defying dire warnings not to return to the school, Harry uncovers dark forces and hidden secrets deep in the bowels of Hogwarts... in fact, a whole chamberful of them. Alan Rickman, Richard Harris and Maggie Smith are all back in the staffroom while a flamboyant Kenneth Branagh takes over as Dark Arts master.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry and his friends face new challenges in their second year at Hogwarts as they uncover a dark force that is terrorising the school.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The tumultuous second term at Hogwarts sees the dynamic trio of Harry (Radcliffe), Hermione (Watson) and Ron (Grint) embroiled in more sticky and shady situations than you can shake a wand at. Defying dire warnings not to return to the school, Harry uncovers dark forces and hidden secrets deep in the bowels of Hogwarts... in fact, a whole chamberful of them. Alan Rickman, Richard Harris and Maggie Smith are all back in the staffroom while a flamboyant Kenneth Branagh takes over as Dark Arts master.

includedAssets.title: Harry Potter And The Prisoner Of Azkaban
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry, Ron and Hermione return for their third year at Hogwarts, and my, haven't they grown... The third film - and many would argue the best - follows the story of the dangerous and enigmatic wizard Sirius Black (Gary Oldman), who has escaped Azkaban prison and is apparently determined to kill Harry. Director Alfonso Cuaron darkens the tone, assisted by a legion of scary Dementors.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Harry, Ron and Hermione begin their third year at Hogwarts, the school is under tight security as a notorious wizard is at large.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry, Ron and Hermione return for their third year at Hogwarts, and my, haven't they grown... The third film - and many would argue the best - follows the story of the dangerous and enigmatic wizard Sirius Black (Gary Oldman), who has escaped Azkaban prison and is apparently determined to kill Harry. Director Alfonso Cuaron darkens the tone, assisted by a legion of scary Dementors.

includedAssets.title: Harry Potter And The Goblet Of Fire
includedAssets.synopsis: Hormones are flying around Hogwarts, as Harry, Ron and Hermione return for the fourth film adaptation of J. K. Rowling's magical adventure series. British director Mike Newell provides a darker, moodier but also funnier slant on Potter as the students face new challenges at the Triwizard Tournament and the dark mark of Lord Voldemort grows even stronger.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry must confront a dragon, fierce water demons and an enchanted maze, only to find himself in the cruel grasp of He Who Must Not Be Named.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hormones are flying around Hogwarts, as Harry, Ron and Hermione return for the fourth film adaptation of J. K. Rowling's magical adventure series. British director Mike Newell provides a darker, moodier but also funnier slant on Potter as the students face new challenges at the Triwizard Tournament and the dark mark of Lord Voldemort grows even stronger.

includedAssets.title: Harry Potter And The Order Of The Phoenix
includedAssets.synopsis: The boy wizard and his homies expected their fifth spell at Hogwarts to be tough... but this is riddikulus! OWL exams are looming, the school is being taken over by a tyrannical new teacher, and - despite Ministry of Magic denials - the evil Lord Voldemort is back in business. Dark times indeed. But with Harry assembling his own secret army, discovering romance and facing a grim prophecy, there's enough action and excitement in J. K. Rowling's fifth adventure to stupefy a Swedish Short-Snout (look it up, muggles).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The wizard forms a secret society to battle Voldemort when the Ministry of Magic refuses to believe that he is alive.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The boy wizard and his homies expected their fifth spell at Hogwarts to be tough... but this is riddikulus! OWL exams are looming, the school is being taken over by a tyrannical new teacher, and - despite Ministry of Magic denials - the evil Lord Voldemort is back in business. Dark times indeed. But with Harry assembling his own secret army, discovering romance and facing a grim prophecy, there's enough action and excitement in J. K. Rowling's fifth adventure to stupefy a Swedish Short-Snout (look it up, muggles).

includedAssets.title: Harry Potter And The Half-Blood Prince
includedAssets.synopsis: In the sixth adventure for the schoolboy wizard, Voldemort is tightening his grip on both the Muggle and wizarding worlds and Hogwarts is no longer the safe haven it once was. Looks like Master Potter has his work cut out - not easy when there are all manner of distractions to keep a teenage wizard off his game! Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson and Rupert Grint knuckle down while oddball teachers, magical creatures and the special effects guys run rampant.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The gang deal with the pangs of young love, as evil Lord Voldemort plots Dumbledore's demise. Spectacular sixth chapter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the sixth adventure for the schoolboy wizard, Voldemort is tightening his grip on both the Muggle and wizarding worlds and Hogwarts is no longer the safe haven it once was. Looks like Master Potter has his work cut out - not easy when there are all manner of distractions to keep a teenage wizard off his game! Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson and Rupert Grint knuckle down while oddball teachers, magical creatures and the special effects guys run rampant.

includedAssets.title: Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows - Part 1
includedAssets.synopsis: School's out for Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Hermione (Emma Watson) and Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) in the dark and diabolic penultimate episode of the wizard saga. Leaving the safety of  Hogwarts behind, the intrepid trio head off into the unknown as Voldemort fine tunes his evil plans for world domination. Classroom high jinks and the jokiness of the previous instalments are left behind as director David Yates paints a dark and brutal tone.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Voldemort takes over the Ministry of Magic, Harry sets out to destroy the horcruxes that give him power.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: School's out for Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Hermione (Emma Watson) and Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) in the dark and diabolic penultimate episode of the wizard saga. Leaving the safety of  Hogwarts behind, the intrepid trio head off into the unknown as Voldemort fine tunes his evil plans for world domination. Classroom high jinks and the jokiness of the previous instalments are left behind as director David Yates paints a dark and brutal tone.

includedAssets.title: Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows - Part 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The final instalment of the Harry Potter saga sees Daniel Radcliffe's teenage wizard locked in the climactic battle for survival with the evil Lord Voldemort. Together with his trusty sidekicks Hermione (Emma Watson) and Ron (Rupert Grint), Harry is seeking the Horcruxes that hold the key to his power... but You-Know-Who now has the Elder Wand and aims to gain complete control after a decisive attack on Hogwarts. Stunning setpieces, a heart-rending emotional pull and an awesome finale bring the Potter saga to a worthy close.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry must face his nemesis Voldemort in an epic final confrontation. Dazzling conclusion to the series.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The final instalment of the Harry Potter saga sees Daniel Radcliffe's teenage wizard locked in the climactic battle for survival with the evil Lord Voldemort. Together with his trusty sidekicks Hermione (Emma Watson) and Ron (Rupert Grint), Harry is seeking the Horcruxes that hold the key to his power... but You-Know-Who now has the Elder Wand and aims to gain complete control after a decisive attack on Hogwarts. Stunning setpieces, a heart-rending emotional pull and an awesome finale bring the Potter saga to a worthy close.

includedAssets.title: Harry Potter
includedAssets.synopsis: A young wizard works his way through the spectacular Hogwarts School, while his evil nemesis plots to destroy the wizarding world. International phenomenon based on the bestselling series of books by JK Rowling. Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Alan Rickman, Ralph Fiennes, Maggie Smith, Robbie Coltrane, Richard Harris and Michael Gambon star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A young wizard works his way through Hogwarts School, while his nemesis plots to destroy the wizarding world. Based on the hit novels by JK Rowling.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A young wizard works his way through the spectacular Hogwarts School, while his evil nemesis plots to destroy the wizarding world. International phenomenon based on the bestselling series of books by JK Rowling. Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Alan Rickman, Ralph Fiennes, Maggie Smith, Robbie Coltrane, Richard Harris and Michael Gambon star.

includedIn.title: Harry Potter
includedIn.synopsis: Young orphan Harry Potter is forced to live with his cruel aunt and uncle until, on his 11th birthday, he discovers he is in fact a wizard. Enrolling in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry learns about the spectacular wizarding world, explores his incredible powers and battles his evil nemesis, Lord Voldemort.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Harry Potter navigates his way through seven years at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, while battling his evil nemesis, Lord Voldemort.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Young orphan Harry Potter is forced to live with his cruel aunt and uncle until, on his 11th birthday, he discovers he is in fact a wizard. Enrolling in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry learns about the spectacular wizarding world, explores his incredible powers and battles his evil nemesis, Lord Voldemort.
